playerDescription: A young, up-and-coming male corpo programmer.
startingLocation:
Region name: Exis' Apartment Interior 

Summary: This region is a player-owned highrise apartment in the utopian upper city above the cloud layer. The player is relatively well-to-do and has upper middle class accommodations. 

Rooms/Locations: Living room, kitchenette, bathroom, bedroom, workshop area, balcony

Region exits: Apartment Block 22H
